label: Microtubule Protofilament Count
mathematical_goal: Connect G2 topology to microtubule structure (speculative Orch-OR extension)
theoretical_significance: This speculative extension of PM to biological systems explores whether microtubule structure (13 protofilaments) might reflect G2 topology. The ratio b3/(k_gimel/Pi) ~ 6 differs from the observed 13, suggesting additional geometric factors are needed. This is marked SEALED as a research direction rather than a validated prediction.

geometry.note: Factor of ~2 discrepancy suggests missing helical correction

orch_or_context.PM_extension: G2 topology might constrain biological structure
